description: Create a task schedule to run the collector script

task.description: Name of the task to run.

environment.description: The Puppet environment the Puppet server is in.

puppetserver.description: FQDN of the Puppet server to run the task on.

auth_token.description: Puppet API auth token. If you don't have one, use username and password instead, and the task will obtain one for you.

username.description: A valid Puppet server username to create the schedule.

password.description: The password for the user to authorize to the Puppet api

ca_cert_path.description: The path to the ca certificate to trust the cert from the Puppet server.

skip_cert_check.description: Trust the Puppetserver ssl certificate without verification.
